sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xSAA_Port_Summary_Results (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, IterationMode TEXT, ExpectedSessions INTEGER, TotBound INTEGER, TotFailed INTEGER, ConfigRequestRate REAL, BindRate REAL, AttemptRate REAL, BindRateTolerance REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xSAA_System_Summary_Results (Iteration INTEGER, IterationMode TEXT, TotalExpectedSessions INTEGER, TotBound INTEGER, TotFailed INTEGER, TotalConfigRequestRate REAL, TotalBindRate REAL, TotalAttemptRate REAL, BindRateTolerance REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xSAA_Block_Iteration_Results (Iteration INTEGER, IterationMode TEXT, DeviceName TEXT, PortName TEXT, DeviceCount INTEGER, TotBound INTEGER, TotFailed INTEGER, ConfigRequestRate REAL, BindRate REAL, AttemptRate REAL, BindRateTolerance REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xSAA_Port_Iteration_Results (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, IterationMode TEXT, ExpectedSessions INTEGER, TotBound INTEGER, TotFailed INTEGER, ConfigRequestRate REAL, BindRate REAL, AttemptRate REAL, BindRateTolerance REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xSAA_System_Iteration_Results (Iteration INTEGER, IterationMode TEXT, TotalExpectedSessions INTEGER, TotBound INTEGER, TotFailed INTEGER, TotalConfigRequestRate REAL, TotalBindRate REAL, TotalAttemptRate REAL, BindRateTolerance REAL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xIteration_Traffic_Failures (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, PortHandle INTEGER, GeneratorSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerSigFrameCount INTEGER)

Children.Name: Results: Store configured session count & Tolerance

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Store configured session count & Tolerance

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xSaaConfiguration (ConfiguredSessionCount REAL, BindRateTolerance REAL)
SELECT
AS ConfiguredSessionCount,
AS BindRateTolerance

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 1177
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Configured Sessin Count that will be saved in a SLAAC Configuration table for use with results queries

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 1179
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Configured Bind Rate Tolerance that will be saved in a SLAAC Configuration table for use with results queries for verification against measured Bind Rate

Children.Name: Results: Add SAA Block/Port/System Results Tables

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Add SAA Block/Port/System Results Tables

sql_statement.static: SELECT IterCfg.Iteration AS 'Iteration', IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', cfg.Name AS 'DeviceName', res.PortName AS 'PortName', cfg.DeviceCount AS 'DeviceCount', res.TotBound AS 'TotBound', res.TotFailed AS 'TotFailed', IterCfg.CurrVal AS 'ConfigRequestRate', res.BindRate AS 'BindRate', res.AttemptRate AS 'AttemptRate', DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance' FROM (Select dev.Name, dev.DeviceCount, saa.Handle FROM SaaDeviceConfig AS saa JOIN EmulatedDevice AS dev where saa.ParentHnd == dev.Handle) as cfg JOIN SaaDeviceResults as res JOIN xSaaConfiguration as DC JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg WHERE res.ParentHnd == cfg.Handle

SELECT IterCfg.Iteration, PortName, IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', DC.ConfiguredSessionCount AS 'ExpectedSessions', PR.TotBound, PR.TotFailed, IterCfg.CurrVal AS 'ConfigRequestRate', PR.BindRate, PR.AttemptRate, DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance' FROM SaaPortConfig AS PC JOIN SaaPortResults AS PR JOIN xSaaConfiguration as DC JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg WHERE PC.ParentHnd == PR.ParentHnd

SELECT IterCfg.Iteration, IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', (SELECT SUM(ED.DeviceCount) FROM EmulatedDevice AS ED JOIN SaaDeviceConfig AS DBC WHERE ED.Handle == DBC.ParentHnd) AS 'TotalExpectedSessions', SUM(PR.TotBound) AS 'TotBound', SUM(PR.TotFailed) AS 'TotFailed', SUM(IterCfg.CurrVal) AS 'TotalConfigRequestRate', SUM(PR.BindRate) AS 'TotalBindRate', SUM(PR.AttemptRate) AS 'TotalAttemptRate', DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance' FROM SaaPortConfig AS PC JOIN SaaPortResults AS PR JOIN xSaaConfiguration as DC JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg WHERE PC.ParentHnd == PR.ParentHnd
SELECT * FROM xSAA_Port_Iteration_Results
SELECT * FROM xSAA_System_Iteration_Results

Children.Name: Results: Run SQL (Delete temp iteration results table in summary db)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Run SQL (Delete temp iteration results table in summary db)

sql_statement.static: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS val_Iteration_SAA_Session_Results
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS val_Iteration_SAA_Rate_Results
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS val_Iteration_Traffic_Results

Children.Name: Results: Add Iteration Traffic Results to Temp Summary

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Add Iteration Traffic Results to Temp Summary

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xIterationSigFrameResults (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, PortHandle INTEGER, GeneratorSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerSigFrameCount INTEGER)

SELECT (SELECT Iteration FROM spirent_methodology_benchmarkstabilityiteratorcommand) AS 'Iteration', p.Name AS 'PortName', p.Handle AS 'PortHandle', gen.GeneratorSigFrameCount, ana.SigFrameCount AS 'AnalyzerSigFrameCount' FROM GeneratorPortResults AS gen JOIN AnalyzerPortResults AS ana JOIN Port AS p WHERE gen.ParentPort == p.Handle AND ana.ParentPort == p.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xIteration_Traffic_Failures (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, PortHandle INTEGER, GeneratorSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerSigFrameCount INTEGER)

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM display_SAA_Iteration_Block_Results)) == 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, CASE WHEN BindRate < (AttemptRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN BindRate > (AttemptRate * (100 + BindRateTolerance)/100) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN DeviceCount != TotBound OR TotFailed > 0 THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict', IterationMode AS 'Iteration State', PortName AS 'Port Name', DeviceName AS 'Device Name', DeviceCount AS 'Expected Session Count', TotBound AS 'Total Bound Count', TotFailed AS 'Total Failed Count', ConfigRequestRate AS 'Configured Request Rate (sessions/s)', AttemptRate AS 'Attempt Rate (sessions/s)', BindRate AS 'Bind Rate (sessions/s)', BindRateTolerance AS 'Bind Rate Tolerance (%)' FROM xSAA_Block_Iteration_Results

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All SAA sessions were bound with no errors detected.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Not all SAA sessions were bound and/or failures were detected.

sql_statement.static: SELECT PortName AS 'Port Name', DeviceName AS 'Device Name', DeviceCount AS 'Expected Session Count', TotBound AS 'Total Bound Count', TotFailed AS 'Total Failed Count' FROM xSAA_Block_Iteration_Results WHERE (TotBound != DeviceCount OR TotFailed > 0)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: SAA Bind Rate within configured threshold of Attempt Rate.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: SAA Bind Rate not within configured threshold of Attempt Rate.

sql_statement.static: SELECT PortName AS 'Port Name', DeviceName AS 'Device Name', DeviceCount AS 'Expected Session Count', ConfigRequestRate AS 'Configured Request Rate (sessions/s)', AttemptRate AS 'Attempt Rate (sessions/s)', BindRate AS 'Bind Rate (sessions/s)' FROM xSAA_Block_Iteration_Results WHERE BindRate < (AttemptRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100) OR BindRate > (AttemptRate * (100 + BindRateTolerance)/100)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Tx/Rx Sig Frame Counts were greater than 0.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE name='val_Iteration_Traffic_Results')) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Detected 0 Tx and/or Rx Sig Frame Counts.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, PortName AS 'Port Name', GeneratorSigFrameCount AS 'Generator Sig Frame Count', AnalyzerSigFrameCount AS 'Analyzer Sig Frame Count' FROM xIterationSigFrameResults WHERE GeneratorSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerSigFrameCount == 0
SELECT Iteration, PortName, PortHandle, GeneratorSigFrameCount, AnalyzerSigFrameCount FROM xIterationSigFrameResults WHERE GeneratorSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerSigFrameCount == 0

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 1265
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Flag to execute commands to verify traffic results

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Value: Parameters for summary results validation configuration

sql_statement.static: SELECT EnableStabilityBackoff, MinVal AS SearchMinVal, MaxVal AS SearchMaxVal, RepeatCount AS StabilityRepeatCount, StepVal AS StabilityBackoffStep, SuccessPercent AS StabilitySuccessPercent, IsConverged, ConvergedVal, FoundStableValue, StableValue FROM spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand WHERE (SELECT Iter.Handle FROM Tag AS Tag, RelationTable AS RT, spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS Iter)

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM SAA_Summary_IteratorProfile)) == 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Error retrieving SAA Iterator configuration settings.

sql_statement.static: SELECT SearchMinVal AS 'Search Minimum Session Rate (sessions/s)', SearchMaxVal AS 'Search Maximum Session Rate (sessions/s)', (CASE WHEN EnableStabilityBackoff = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END) AS 'Enable Stability Backoff', StabilityRepeatCount AS 'Stability Repeat Count', StabilityBackoffStep AS 'Stability Backoff Step', StabilitySuccessPercent AS 'Stability Backoff Success (%)' FROM SAA_IteratorEndState

Children.Name: Results: Verify DB Query (Report table for converged/final value)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Verify DB Query (Report table for converged/final value)

Properties.Name: SqlQuery
Properties.Value: SELECT CASE IsConverged WHEN 0 THEN 'Did not converge' ELSE ConvergedVal END AS 'Converged Rate (sessions/s)', CASE FoundStableValue WHEN 0 THEN CASE EnableStabilityBackOff WHEN 0 THEN 'N/A' ELSE 'No stable rate found' END ELSE StableValue END AS 'Stable Rate (sessions/s)', CurrVal AS 'Final Rate (sessions/s)' FROM spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand

Properties.Name: FailedVerdictExplanation
Properties.Value: Failed to report Test Summary Results

Children.Name: Results: Verify SAA System/Port Summary Results

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Verify SAA System/Port Summary Results

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Error retrieving SAA System Summary Results.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM xSAA_System_Summary_Results)) == 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, CASE WHEN TotalBindRate < (TotalAttemptRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN TotalBindRate > (TotalAttemptRate * (100 + BindRateTolerance)/100) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN TotalExpectedSessions != TotBound OR TotFailed > 0 THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict', IterationMode AS 'Test Phase', TotalExpectedSessions AS 'Total Expected Session Count', TotBound AS 'Total Bound Count', TotFailed AS 'Total Failed Count', TotalConfigRequestRate AS 'Total Request Rate (sessions/s)', TotalAttemptRate AS 'Total Attempt Rate (sessions/s)', TotalBindRate AS 'Total Bind Rate (sessions/s)', BindRateTolerance AS 'Bind Rate Tolerance (%)' FROM xSAA_System_Summary_Results

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Error retrieving SAA Port Summary Results.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM xSAA_Port_Summary_Results)) == 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, CASE WHEN BindRate < (AttemptRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN BindRate > (AttemptRate * (100 + BindRateTolerance)/100) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN ExpectedSessions != TotBound OR TotFailed > 0 THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict', IterationMode AS 'Test Phase', PortName AS 'Port', ExpectedSessions AS 'Expected Sessions', TotBound AS 'Bound Count', TotFailed AS 'Failed Count', ConfigRequestRate AS 'Configured Request Rate (sessions/s)', AttemptRate AS 'Attempt Rate (sessions/s)', BindRate AS 'Bind Rate (sessions/s)', BindRateTolerance AS 'Bind Rate Tolerance (%)' FROM xSAA_Port_Summary_Results

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All SAA sessions were bound without errors.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Not all SAA sessions are bound and/or error detected.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE name='SAA_Bound_Results')) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, IterationMode AS 'Test Phase', PortName AS 'Port', ExpectedSessions AS 'Expected Sessions', TotBound AS 'Bound Count' FROM xSAA_Port_Summary_Results WHERE ExpectedSessions != TotBound OR TotFailed > 0

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: SAA Bind Rate within configured threshold of Attempt Rate.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: SAA Bind Rate not within configured threshold of Attempt Rate.

sql_for_verdict.static: WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM xSAA_Port_Summary_Results WHERE BindRate < (AttemptRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100))) > 0 THEN 0
WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM xSAA_Port_Summary_Results WHERE BindRate > (AttemptRate * (100 + BindRateTolerance)/100))) > 0 THEN 0

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, IterationMode AS 'Test Phase', PortName AS 'Port', ExpectedSessions AS 'Number of Sessions', ConfigRequestRate AS 'Configured Request Rate (sessions/s)', AttemptRate AS 'Attempt Rate (sessions/s)', BindRate AS 'Bind Rate (sessions/s)' FROM xSAA_Port_Summary_Results
WHERE BindRate < (AttemptRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100) OR BindRate > (AttemptRate * (100 + BindRateTolerance)/100)

Children.Name: Results: Verify Traffic Iteration Results Failures

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Verify Traffic Iteration Results Failures

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Tx/Rx Frame Counts were greater than 0.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Detected 0 Tx and/or Rx Frame Count.

sql_statement.static: SELECT * FROM xIteration_Traffic_Failures
